column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Trial - Compounded or Withdrawn (Col. 4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Trial - No. of Cases - in which Trials were Completed - Convicted (Col. 5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Trial - No. of Cases - in which Trials were Completed - Acquitted or Discharged (Col. 6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Trial - No. of Cases - in which Trials were Completed - Total {(Col. 5) + (Col. 6)} = (Col. 7)
column8: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Trial - Pending Trial (Col. 8)
